attributes.action: Shut down the HATE groups and there vile content, that are directed at the dying Jade Goody
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I along with thousands of others I imagine, find it completely dispicable that Facebook has allowed such Vile groups to be formed.
The content of the posts on these groups are not acceptable.
Everyone is entitled to their opinion, but to personally wish Cancer on anyone is unacceptable....let alone wish them dead from it.

Please sign this petition to get these groups removed ASAP

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
